meanings.definition: A person who is sexually attracted to individuals of the opposite sex.
meanings.sent1: Heterosexuals often form romantic relationships with people of the opposite gender.
meanings.sent2: Many heterosexuals marry someone of the opposite sex.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the group of heterosexuals joked about their crushes on classmates.
meanings.sent4: In a world of only heterosexuals, the concept of same-sex attraction would be foreign.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed a diverse group of characters, including heterosexuals in loving relationships.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characterized by a sexual orientation toward individuals of the opposite sex.
meanings.sent1: The dating app caters to heterosexuals seeking opposite-sex partners.
meanings.sent2: She identified as heterosexual and was only interested in dating men.
meanings.sent3: The restaurant had a humorous sign saying 'No shirt, no shoes, no service - unless you're a heterosexual.'
meanings.sent4: The town's culture was so deeply heterosexual that same-sex relationships were unheard of.
meanings.sent5: The advertisement featured a happy heterosexual couple enjoying a day at the beach.
